short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create a favorites list for your conversations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you a power user of ChatGPT? Tired of scrolling endlessly and digging through old conversations just to find a specific conversation? With the 'ChatGPT Favorites' Chrome extension, you'll never have to do that again! ChatGPT doesn’t natively offer a way to save your favorite conversations, but our extension fills that gap. Simply click the 'Favorite' button added by the extension. Your chats are kept in the 'Favorites' section, so you can quickly find what you need without scrolling through your history. Save time and maintain a smooth workflow by having all important chats in one easily accessible place. Don’t let valuable conversations get lost—take control of your ChatGPT experience!"
